summary: This is an email chain from March 11, 2019, discussing a presentation on campaign finance cases with ties to the President of the United States (POTUS). The email mentions the need to ask someone to 'step out' due to potential conflicts, and the subject line references 'Epstein OK'.

persons.name: Russell
persons.context: Mentioned as being asked, along with the email author, by Laura to present on campaign finance cases involving NRA, PIC, and GEP.

persons.name: Laura
persons.context: Asked Russell and the email author to present on campaign finance cases with POTUS ties.

connections.description: Laura asked Russell to present on campaign finance cases.

events.title: Email discussion on campaign finance presentation
events.description: An email exchange discusses preparing a presentation on campaign finance cases (NRA, PIC, GEP) with ties to POTUS, and questions whether someone needs to step out.

keyFacts: The email subject line contains 'Epstein OK', directly linking the correspondence to Jeffrey Epstein.
The email discusses campaign finance cases involving NRA, PIC, and GEP, all noted as having ties to the President of the United States (POTUS).
The email raises a question about whether someone needs to 'step out', suggesting potential recusal or conflict of interest concerns.
The correspondence is dated March 11, 2019, which is after Epstein's 2008 plea deal but before his 2019 arrest.
